TitleEnglish: Legend of the Emperor: the Chronicles of Ji Fa
SummaryEnglish: Gifted with divine power, Ji Fa is feared by King Zhou, which leads him to unleash his power on several occasions to protect his loved ones. However, his power spirals out of control, endangering his own life. After the death of his master, the loss of friends and the death of his mother, he is entrusted with a great responsibility by heaven. This young hero will embark on a path of sacrifice and self-improvement to fulfill his destiny.
Aliases: Legend of the Emperor: Ji Fa Chapter
The Legend of the Son of Heaven: Ji Fa
